section.27: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:"When the slave (of Allah) lies, the angel goes a mile away from him because of the stench of what he has done."Yahya said: "(I asked) 'Abdur-Rahim bin Harun if he approved of it,and he said 'Yes
